elements.label: Sanguine (Knight)
elements.description: The knight is talkative and compassionate. They strive to provide encouraging words, maybe even warm hugs.

elements.label: Exhausted Sanguine (Knight)
elements.description: The knight is talkative and compassionate. They strive to provide encouraging words, maybe even warm hugs.

elements.label: Choleric (Knight)
elements.description: The knight is intense and energetic. They are prone to mood swings.

elements.label: Exhausted Choleric (Knight)
elements.description: The knight is intense and energetic. They are prone to mood swings.

elements.label: Phlegmatic (Bishop)
elements.description: The bishop appears calm and observant. They know what to say in every situation.

elements.label: Exhausted Phlegmatic (Bishop)
elements.description: The bishop appears calm and observant. They know what to say in every situation.

elements.label: Choleric (Bishop)
elements.description: The bishop likes to be in control of the situation. They are practical and always have a purpose.

elements.label: Exhausted Choleric (Bishop)
elements.description: The bishop likes to be in control of the situation. They are practical and always have a purpose.

elements.label: Sanguine (Scribe)
elements.description: The scribe is creative and has the potential to accomplish anything. They are self-assured.

elements.label: Exhausted Sanguine (Scribe)
elements.description: The scribe is creative and has the potential to accomplish anything. They are self-assured.

elements.label: Phlegmatic (Scribe)
elements.description: The scribe is reserved and rational. They are good at analyzing facts.

elements.label: Exhausted Phlegmatic (Scribe)
elements.description: The scribe is reserved and rational. They are good at analyzing facts.

elements.label: Sanguine (Taverner)
elements.description: The taverner smiles and talks easily. They live in the moment.

elements.label: Exhausted Sanguine (Taverner)
elements.description: The taverner smiles and talks easily. They live in the moment.

elements.label: Melancholic (Taverner)
elements.description: The taverner has powerful emotions. They needs something to hold on to, be it the scribe or a beer.

elements.label: Exhausted Melancholic (Taverner)
elements.description: The taverner has powerful emotions. They needs something to hold on to, be it the scribe or a beer.

elements.label: Melancholic (Doctor)
elements.description: The doctor is a perfectionist. The more they care, the more they ruminate.

elements.label: Exhausted Melancholic (Doctor)
elements.description: The doctor is a perfectionist. The more they care, the more they ruminate.

elements.label: Phlegmatic (Doctor)
elements.description: The doctor is insightful and compassionate. They may appear needy when seeking a connection.

elements.label: Exhausted Phlegmatic (Doctor)
elements.description: The doctor is insightful and compassionate. They may appear needy when seeking a connection.

elements.label: Choleric (Vicar)
elements.description: The vicar never gives in to the pressure of others. They are determined and quick-thinking.

elements.label: Exhausted Choleric (Vicar)
elements.description: The vicar never gives in to the pressure of others. They are determined and quick-thinking.

elements.label: Melancholic (Vicar)
elements.description: The vicar is no stranger to the tragedy and cruelty in the world. They are self-centered for a reason.

elements.label: Exhausted Melancholic (Vicar)
elements.description: The vicar is no stranger to the tragedy and cruelty in the world. They are self-centered for a reason.
